entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 17 April 2023
